id.description: The unique identifier of the attachment

name.description: The name of the attachment. Can be a file name or a URL. This is used to display the attachment in the chat message.

contentType.description: The content type of the attachment. This is used to determine how the attachment should be handled or displayed.

chatMessageId.description: The unique identifier to the chat message to which this attachment belongs. This is used to associate the attachment with the correct chat message. It is a foreign key to the ChatMessage model.

id.description: The unique identifier of the message

createdAt.description: The date the message was created

owner.description: The unique identifier of the user who sent the message

chatId.description: The unique identifier of the chat to which this message belongs

createdAt.description: The date the chat was created

participants.description: A list of participants in the chat
